content:
1e2f44a7bd8c4d2e9a31d63b3:
  'Description': Describes the issue of a device performing slowly and possible
    solutions.
  'Name': Slow Performance
  'Entity':
  - 'Slot_Description': The brand of the laptop experiencing slow performance.
    'Identifier': 73859631e90e42ea850900bea
    'Slot_Name': brand
    'Example_values':
    - Dell
    - HP
    - Lenovo
    - Apple
    - Acer
    - Asus
  - 'Slot_Description': The model of the laptop experiencing slow performance.
    'Identifier': 52e85c05a5814279b30298a72
    'Slot_Name': model
  - 'Slot_Description': The operating system installed on the laptop experiencing
      slow performance.
    'Identifier': 5bcfa46f9ae6407aa2004f43f
    'Slot_Name': operating_system
  - 'Slot_Description': The amount of memory (RAM) installed on the laptop experiencing
      slow performance.
    'Identifier': f3c16c7f68164790851e35ad9
    'Slot_Name': memory
    'Example_values':
    - 4GB
    - 8GB
    - 16GB
    - 32GB
    - 64GB
  - 'Slot_Description': The type of storage installed on the laptop experiencing
      slow performance.
    'Identifier': ed2914cc34c44fa99d9e85152
    'Slot_Name': storage
94102b6cdf5346fea60370053:
  'Description': Refers to the process of updating the device's operating
    system or apps to the latest version.
  'Name': Software Updates
  'Entity':
  - 'Slot_Description': The name of the software to update.
    'Identifier': e8f3737830be4378a433663e6
    'Slot_Name': software_name
  - 'Slot_Description': The type of update to perform.
    'Identifier': 01e0450022ba47e79e7fa6016
    'Slot_Name': update_type
bfc48e40480f4e15ac0eed528:
  'Description': Covers the process of upgrading or replacing hardware components
    on the device, such as adding more memory or replacing a faulty part.
  'Name': Hardware Upgrades
  'Entity':
  - 'Slot_Description': The laptop component to upgrade.
    'Identifier': 074b0f32199d44a691fea70e7
    'Slot_Name': component
    'Example_values':
    - RAM
    - storage
    - CPU
    - GPU
    - Wi-Fi card
    - battery
  - 'Slot_Description': The brand of the laptop component.
    'Identifier': e809f52a12b64df2bf0c4de92
    'Slot_Name': brand
    'Example_values':
    - Crucial
    - Kingston
    - Samsung
    - WD
    - Intel
    - AMD
    - Sony
    - Dell
  - 'Slot_Description': The model of the laptop component.
    'Identifier': 07c444e9639e4af8a35dbb788
    'Slot_Name': model
  - 'Slot_Description': The size of the laptop component.
    'Identifier': b30ac894665248c8969302dd8
    'Slot_Name': size
    'Example_values':
    - 8GB
    - 16GB
    - 32GB
    - 512GB
    - 1TB
    - 2TB
    - 2.4GHz
    - 3.6GHz
e196ca7088a94ad497ab51ced:
  'Description': Identifying, diagnosing, and resolving issues that cause
    a system or application to fail or produce incorrect results.
  'Name': Troubleshoot Errors
  'Entity':
  - 'Slot_Description': The specific error code being encountered with the firewall.
    'Identifier': 180156b3e822487ca78a1347f
    'Slot_Name': error_code
  - 'Slot_Description': The type or brand of firewall in use.
    'Identifier': 6a360d118b2e4335954240544
    'Slot_Name': firewall_type
  - 'Slot_Description': The operating system where the firewall is installed.
    'Identifier': 81b98a2873034bcaba0d113f6
    'Slot_Name': operating_system
e99c19ccf3d04c3ab61baea94:
  'Description': Indicates the device's battery is excessively hot, which
    can be a safety concern and reduce battery life.
  'Name': Battery Overheat
  'Entity':
  - 'Slot_Description': The brand of the laptop experiencing overheating issues.
    'Identifier': 27a5ee00bc0c4f2692ede1ba6
    'Slot_Name': laptop_brand
  - 'Slot_Description': The specific model of the laptop experiencing overheating
      issues.
    'Identifier': 4c4534fb1c644338aba8136e2
    'Slot_Name': laptop_model
  - 'Slot_Description': The temperature at which the laptop's battery is overheating.
    'Identifier': e4f0619686034fddabbbb7529
    'Slot_Name': temperature
  - 'Slot_Description': The symptoms associated with the laptop's overheating issues.
    'Identifier': 89b6ec969b1c4d80bacc98c45
    'Slot_Name': symptoms
